game.name: Slacker: Job Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Collect shopping carts, ignore customers, and complete To-Do lists that encourage mischief and mayhem. Fight a chicken mascot, prevent an alien invasion, learn to breakdance, crash a forklift, and more. How much can you get away with and still keep your job?
